basics.name: Jeano Ermitaño
basics.summary: Accomplished IT professional with over 5 years of managerial experience, transitioning to cybersecurity with certifications in Cisco, ISC2,  and EC-Council Ethical Hacking Essentials, ready to leverage my leadership and technical skills to strengthen organizational security.

work.name: STI College Las Piñas
work.summary: Managing the degree programs BSIT, BSCS, BSCpE, and BMMA, including faculty development plans, evaluation, student pre-assessment, faculty loading, etc.
highlights: Subjects taught: 2D Animation (OpenToonz), 3D Modeling (Blender), Advanced Database Systems (SQL Server, MongoDB), Advanced Mobile Programming (Power Apps), Advanced Web Design (PHP), Advanced Web Programming (ASP.NET), COE On-the-Job Training, Computer Network and Security (Parrot OS), Computer Productivity Tools (Office 365), Computer Programming 1 (Java), Computer Programming 2 (HTML, CSS, Javascript), Computer Programming 3 (C#), CS Practicum, Empowerment Technologies, Game Development (Unity), History of Graphic Design, Information Assurance & Security (Cybersecurity Fundamentals), Information Security and Management, Information Systems Analysis and Design (UML), Information Systems Operations and Maintenance, Interactive Media Design (Figma), Intermediate Mobile Programming (Xamarin, .NET MAUI), IT Application Tools in Business, IT Practicum, Java Micro Edition Programming, Management Information Systems, Managing Information and Technology, Mobile Applications Development (Android), Programming Languages (Python), Programming Logic and Design (Java), Seminars and Fieldtrips, Software Design, Software Engineering (SDLC), Software Engineering 2, Theory of Computations with Automata

work.name: Personiv
work.summary: Designing beautiful, responsive websites using the latest technologies to transform a copy into a fully-functioning website in less than 3 days.
